patches.changelog: jump in a hole simulator - beta 1 üï≥Ô∏è hey everyone! we‚Äôre super excited to finally drop the first beta version of jump in a hole simulator. thanks for being here at the start of what‚Äôs hopefully a long, weird, and very wholesome journey. (get it?) what the games about: - you can jump in a hole! that‚Äôs‚Ä¶ basically it. features: - a leaderboard so you can see how many times you‚Äôve jumped (and maybe flex to the whole wide world). - meet the sentient sign: name? undetermined. the more you jump, the more it talks! - unlock 10 hole skins as you jump more! - play with up to 8 friends at the same time. more friends, more chaos, more.. i don't know, i'm running out of ideas. notes - the game is intentionally boring and repetitive. that‚Äôs kind of the point. embrace it! if you think this is hyperbole, you're wrong. the only thing you do in this game is jump in a hole. - first release, so expect bugs, quirks, and maybe a grumpy sign.

jump in a hole simulator - beta 2 üï≥Ô∏è hey everyone! we‚Äôve been busy jumping into a bunch of holes ourselves, and here‚Äôs what‚Äôs new in this update: new features - settings menu - tweak your experience however you like. - improved camera controls - smoother looking down those holes. - player colors - pick a color for your character, now respawn points shine in your color too. - dialogue history - press t to see the sign‚Äôs new and improved history menu. - multiplayer jump counter sign - see how much you contributed to your group‚Äôs total jumps. - leaderboard refresh timer - know exactly when things update. - lobby stats ‚Äì click a lobby to see its info. - quick time events ‚Äì keeping AFK-ers honest (you know who you are). qol improvements - top 5 global lobbies now have special colors on the leaderboard. - leaderboard entries color-coordinated: - white = default - blue = a player from your game was in this lobby - yellow = this is your lobby - sign text speed tweaked for easier reading. - simpler controls - no more holding left alt or t, just press it. - player collisions removed - jump freely without bumping friends. - separated leaderboards by group sizes: 1, 2, 3‚Äì5, 6‚Äì8. bug fixes - fixed servers ending sessions when updating. - fixed lobbies allowing up to 50 players (now capped correctly). - fixed day/night cycle occasionally lasting 10 seconds.
